util

Class BloomFilter<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.BloomFilter<E>

  • public class BloomFilter<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of elements of type E for which the only operation is a probabilistic membership test.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BloomFilter(java.util.Collection<E> elems, int numBytes, int numHashFunctions)
      Create a new Bloom filter with elems inside.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void insert(E elem)
      Add elem to the Bloom filter.
      boolean mightContain(E elem)
      Check whether elem might be in the collection.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BloomFilter

        public BloomFilter(java.util.Collection<E> elems,
           int numBytes,
           int numHashFunctions)
        Create a new Bloom filter with elems inside. The bit array is of length 8 * numBytes. The Bloom filter uses the specified number of hash functions.
        Parameters:
        elems - The collection of elements to be added to this filter
        numBytes - The length of the byte array representing bit array
        numHashFunctions - The number of hash functions to be used in this filter

    • Method Detail

      • insert

        public void insert(E elem)
        Add elem to the Bloom filter.

      • mightContain

        public boolean mightContain(E elem)
        Check whether elem might be in the collection.
